
# Miner Drill Count

For a given total SPM, how many Mining drills are required

## [3000 / minute](https://kirkmcdonald.github.io/calc.html#)

* Iron 22.7k 3-Prod
* Copper 25.2k 3-Prod

* Iron 6.5k 3-Speed
* Copper 7.25k 3-Speed
* Oil  ???

* 488,605 iron ore 3-speed
* 542,362 copper ore 3-speed
 
## [20,000 / minute](https://kirkmcdonald.github.io/calc.html#)

* Iron 43.4k 3-Speed
* Copper 48.2k 3-Speed

* 3,257,366 iron ore 3-speed
* 3,615,750 copper ore 3-speed
